data.title: 'Modern Family' to return? Sofia Vergara shares her interests in the show. Where to watch all seasons?
data.meta_description: Sofia Vergara has recently revealed her interest in a possible 'Modern Family' revival during a podcast. She said that she would be participating 'just for the experience'.
data.text:
Synopsis

Sofia Vergara has recently revealed her interest in a possible 'Modern Family' revival during a podcast. She said that she would be participating 'just for the experience'.

Sofia Vergara's notable performance in ABC's very popular sitcom 'Modern Family' has been one of the pivotal points towards the franchise's immense success. Created by Christopher Lloyd and Steven Levitan, the TV show ran for a record 250 episodes and ended four years back, leaving hopes for fans that it may return soon. Now, Vergara's recent podcast has again fueled the rumors about Modern Family coming back for a reunion or a full-fledged season. According to 'Collider', she wants to participate in any upcoming 'Modern Family' season or show just for the experience of it all, which she must have missed for the better part of four years now.

Vergara's rise to fame after Modern Family

Vergara shot to fame after 2009 when she began her journey with the 'Modern Family', which saw 11 seasons released till 2020. It seems now that Vergara has found her lost oxygen back with the miniseries 'Griselda', which was released in January back in 2024. She played the drug lord Griselda Blanco.

Sofia Vergara's role in 'Modern Family'

Vergara played the character of Gloria Delgado-Pritchett since the first episode of 'Modern Family'. In the series, she was a young Colombian mother, married to the Prichett family and it was assumed that she got married in the family for money.

Vergara has been a consistent part of 'America's Got Talent' show since 2020, which may be seen as her replacement kick for 'Modern Family'. There are still no confirmed reports as to 'Modern Family' coming back for any fresh episodes or seasons, but one can always keep hoping.

'Modern Family': Where to watch all seasons?

If you wish to catch up on all eleven seasons of 'Modern Family', you can do it easily by logging in to your Hulu or Peacock accounts and bingeing it easily.

FAQs:

1. Who were the lead actors in 'Modern Family'?

'Modern Family', one of ABC's leading TV series that ran for 250 episodes and 11 seasons, starred notable actors like Ed O'Neill, Sofia Vergara, Julie Bowen, Ty Burrell, Jesse Tyler Ferguson and many others.

2. When was the first season of 'Modern Family' released?

The first season of 'Modern Family' was released in the year 2009 and continued for eleven seasons until 2020. The series contained almost 250 episodes to date.
